alert.note: Alert for Columbia; Dane; Iowa; Sauk (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 22 at 7:40PM CDT by NWS Milwaukee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Iowa, southwestern Columbia, northwestern Dane and southern Sauk Counties through 815 PM CDT... At 740 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Sauk City to near Spring Green. Movement was southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40-50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Western Madison, Fitchburg, Middleton, Waunakee, Verona, Mount Horeb, Dodgeville, Prairie Du Sac, Sauk City, Lake Wisconsin, Cross Plains, Lodi, Mazomanie, Spring Green, Shorewood Hills, Black Earth, Barneveld, Dane, Blue Mounds, and Arena. This includes the following highways... U.S. Highway 18 between mile markers 52 and 75, and between mile markers 81 and 84. U.S. Highway 12 between mile markers 249 and 261. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
